Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Northbound Reroute near Halsted/105th
ShortDescription: Northbound 8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 107th, Vincennes, 103rd and Halsted: due to, street blockage near Halsted/105th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 107th, Vincennes, 103rd, Halsted and over regular route: due to, street blockage near Halsted/105th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Roosevelt due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Roosevelt due to a sick customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
